}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== This particular card has a P/N of ''03-0147-000'', revision '''C'''. The unit's S/N is ''HMGRD49C73''.
All the model / product info, "ALL RIGHTS RESERVED", the '''3Com''' logo, "(C) 1997", "U.S PATENT: 5,307,459", and "10 Mbps Signalling Rate" is silkscreened on the top of the card. :*'''PARALLEL TASKING II''' :*'''PERFORMANCE''' :*'''3Com 40-0456-004''' :*'''0133T 43172435''' :*'''AGERE 40-04564'''
